tp:treatment-sec.p: DORSAL DISC. Disc pentagonal; flat (about same level as arms). Integument not obscuring plates. Dorsal disc with granules; with concealed primary plates; without scales; without spines. Dorsal disc scale/plate without tubercles. Radial shield present; with tubercles grown out of plate; length more than half of the disc radius; bar-like.
VERTEBRAE . Vertebrae hourglass-shaped (streptospondylous); beyond segment 5 non-keeled; with oral bridge ( Fig. 3E ).
